name: Lisa's Wedding
writer: Matt Groening (created by), James L. Brooks (developed by), Matt Groening (developed by), Sam Simon (developed by), Greg Daniels, Richard Appel (staff writer), Jennifer Crittenden (staff writer)
actors: Dan Castellaneta, Julie Kavner, Nancy Cartwright, Yeardley Smith
plot: A fortune teller gives Lisa a look at her wedding in the year 2010.
